thread.title: BRIEF-Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences passes review of high-tech enterprise recognition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences passes review of high-tech enterprise recognition

organizations.name: brief-chengdu information technology of chinese academy of sciences
chengdu information technology of chinese academy of sciences co ltd

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences Co Ltd :
* Says it passes review of high-tech enterprise recognition
* To enjoy a tax preference of 15 percent for three years
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Eu2s4q
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
